endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of personalized content recommendations for a user based on preferences and viewing history.
Submit user feedback on recommended content to improve the personalization model.
Fetch a list of currently trending content globally or by region.
Retrieve a user's content preferences and settings for personalized recommendations.
Update a user's content preferences to refine recommendations.
Add a record of content viewed by the user to update their viewing history.
Obtain a list of popular genres or categories in the service.
Fetch content similar to a specific title based on its characteristics.
Retrieve engagement metrics and insights for content recommendations.
Manually submit a recommendation for a user to assist in testing the service.
